text:
ELECTRICAL TECHNICIAN   
Mohammad Khalilullah Ansari
Bahuar kala, Jhulnipur, Nichlaul
Maharajganj (U.P)
Mobile No: +91-8329077811
Mail Id: Khalilullah2012@gmail.com
Career Objective:
A position as an industrial electrician which allowing me to use my skill and experience to develop organisation and will 
help me in improving my skills further.
Professional Summary:
Recently I worked as an electrician in Kevin Electrical  Ptv. Ltd. Company. I assure you to show my performance up to 
entire satisfaction. You will find me hard worker, punctual and self motivated.
Key Skills:
Building, Villa’s and warehouse – LV Power distribution  – Electrical control system (LV) – Electrical & Maintenance – 
Electromechanical Repair – Switches & Circuit breakers – Electrical Code – Safety & QA – Wiring diagrams – 
Troubleshooting – Testing Instruments – Induction motor – PVC & MS Conduit – Switchgear – Relay logic control – 
Contractor control – Cable glanding – Cable termination …. 
Work Experience:
Kevin Electrical  Ptv. Ltd. Company (2016 to till now)
Electrician
Installation, repair, maintenance electrical wire and equipment.
Ensure that all work done is in compliance with health & safety regulations.
Diagnosing fixing and locating electrical faults using hand tools and testing equipments.
Checking & testing circuit breakers and repairing them where necessary.
Undertaking electrical installation and routine maintenance work.
Maintenance and repairing all electrical equipments.
Connecting wire to transformer, circuit breakers and other electrical components.
Installation distribution board, switch board plate and ega box fixing.
Fixing Ms & PVC pipe, conduit pipe for wire laying and connecting switch board to Panel.
Fixing cable tray and laying LV& MV cable.
Saudi Pan Kingdom Company  (2014 to 2016)
Electrician
Responsible for installing, maintaining, assembling and electrical equipments.
Performed maintenance and repairing work on electrical panel and distribution systems.
Electrical maintenance and repair at industry.
Install new electrical systems.
Page 1 of 2Troubleshooting electrical related issues with electrical systems.
Install and repair circuit board and faulty wiring.
Maintained and repair electrical equipments and wiring appliances.
Repaired and replaced wiring of old installed electrical equipments.
